chinese: 讲座；演讲；讲课 演讲；
english: lecture

chinese: 教授正在讲授心脏解剖课程。
english: The professor is giving a lecture on the anatomy of the heart

chinese: 仿效；努力赶上（超过）
english: emulate

chinese: 她正在努力仿效那名优等生记笔记的方式。
english: She is trying to emulate the way the top student takes notes

chinese: m，管理，行政，管理部门
english: administration

chinese: 她在大学的行政办公室里工作。
english: She works in the university's administration office

chinese: 1.监督，管理
english: supervision

chinese: 这位年轻的职员在老板的监督下努力工作。
english: The young staff member worked hard under the supervision of his boss

chinese: 投，掷；投射（光）；投票；选定演员几.投掷物；铸件；演员表，演员阵容
english: cast

chinese: 他在海边准备把石块投掷出去。
english: He's going to cast that rock by the seaside

chinese: D.打算，意图
english: intention

chinese: 我一心想买房，所以现在必须开始存钱了。
english: I have every intention of buying a house, so I must start saving now

chinese: v说，发出 ad），无条件的
english: utter

chinese: 宝宝说出了他的第一句话：“妈妈！”
english: The baby utters its first words

chinese: 馬冬眠
english: hibernation

chinese: 小点儿声！这只熊在冬眠呢，别把它吵醒啦！
english: The bear is in hibernation now, don't wake him up

chinese: n.盎司
english: ounce

chinese: 一磅等于16盎司。
english: Sixteen ounces equal to one pound

chinese: adi. 易弯曲的，柔软的
english: flexible

chinese: 这支铅笔非常柔软，甚至可以打结。
english: The pencil is flexible enough to be knotted

chinese: adj，苗条的 V（用运动、节食等方式）减轻体重，变苗条
english: slim

chinese: 自从节食开始，她的身材就变得很苗条了。
english: Ever since she started her diet, she has had a very slim figure

chinese: n。愤慨
english: indignation

chinese: 看到很多工人的工资被拖欠，她感到满心愤
english: She was filled with indignation at the news that many workers' wages were defaulted

chinese: n人口普查，人口调查；统计
english: census

chinese: 政府正在做人口普查。请问一下：这里住了多少人？
english: The government is taking a census

chinese: 凶加宽；变宽
english: widen

chinese: 这条路太窄了，所以现在我们要把它加宽。
english: This road was too narrow, so now we have to widen it

chinese: 几症状：征兆
english: symptom

chinese: 流感的症状包括头痛、嗓子痛和发烧。
english: Flu symptoms include a headache, a sore throat, and a fever

chinese: n. 关押
english: imprisonment

chinese: 德雷文被判处七年监禁。
english: Draven was sentenced to seven years' imprisonment
